I am developing a boardgame in a web browser, here is a summary: ✅ Simultaneous-Turn Multiplayer Grid Game Summary Project Overview: A 2-player online game with simultaneous turn-based mechanics. Played on a 101×101 grid where each player controls 3 ships. Backend: Python with Flask + Flask-SocketIO. Frontend: HTML, JavaScript, Canvas. Gameplay Structure: Setup Phase: Players select a home base location at the start of the game (single occurrence). Base remains hidden from the opponent but visible to the player who placed it. Turn Structure: Each turn consists of: Firing Phase: Players select up to 3 shots, choosing between "laser" (radius 5) and "bomb" (radius 2). Bombs can only be placed within a radius of 8 tiles from a ship. If a bomb hits the opponent's base, the game ends immediately with a victory for the attacker. Movement Phase: Players move their ships and set cost circles using available fuel. Players can also buy beacons (costs $25 or $15 at a shop). Beacons can be placed, rotated, and confirmed. They emit a rectangular area in one of four directions and reveal whether the opponent’s base is inside that area. Terrain and Map Features: Terrain types: Gas (+20 Fuel) - 10 ovals with radius ≈ 6 Stars (+40 Fuel) - 8 ovals with radius ≈ 4 Gems (+10 Bucks) - 14 ovals with radius ≈ 5 Super Gems (+20 Bucks) - 8 ovals with radius ≈ 3 Shops (3×3 clusters, 10 locations) - allow for discounted beacon purchases The map features random-like, non-symmetrical terrain placement, allowing certain elements to spill off the grid. Current Issues and Considerations: Beacon placement logic was recently fixed to resolve a turn progression issue. The beacon rectangle direction was aligned with the arrow direction. Terrain generation was refined to avoid symmetry, using fixed positions while maintaining a random-like appearance. Attached are the HTML and python files that currently work, but I will be improving upon with your help. any questions before we start making changes?

<script>
/******************** CONSTANTS & CANVAS SETUP ********************/
const SZ=10,N=101,LASER_R=5,BOMB_R=2,BOMB_RANGE=8;
const BG=document.getElementById('bg').getContext('2d');
const ctx=document.getElementById('draw').getContext('2d');
const socket=io();

/******************** STATE ********************/
let role=null,phase={X:'base',O:'base'};
let ships=[],oldShips=[],radii=[0,0,0];
let gas=new Set(),starT=new Set(),gem=new Set(),sgem=new Set(),shop=new Set();
let enemyOld=[],enemyRad=[],enemyCr=[],enemyBk=[],circleTog={};
let shots=[];                        // {x,y,id,type}
let currentWeapon='laser';
let baseCell=null;                  // grid id
let placingBase=false;
let gameEnded=false;

// Beacon data
let beacons=[];                     // permanent list {owner,cell,dir,hit}
let pendingBeacon=null;             // {x,y,id,dir}
let draggingBeacon=false;

/******************** UTILS ********************/
const cellXY=id=>[id%N,Math.floor(id/N)];
const toId  =(x,y)=>y*N+x;
function canvasCell(e){const r=ctx.canvas.getBoundingClientRect();const x=Math.floor((e.clientX-r.left)/SZ),y=Math.floor((e.clientY-r.top)/SZ);if(x>=0&&x<N&&y>=0&&y<N)return {x,y,id:toId(x,y)};}
function clear(){ctx.clearRect(0,0,1010,1010);}   
function drawTri(x,y,color){const size=4*SZ,cx=x*SZ+SZ/2,cy=y*SZ;ctx.fillStyle=color;ctx.beginPath();ctx.moveTo(cx,cy);ctx.lineTo(cx-size/2,cy+size);ctx.lineTo(cx+size/2,cy+size);ctx.closePath();ctx.fill();}
function distanceId(id,x,y){const[xx,yy]=cellXY(id);return Math.hypot(x-xx,y-yy);}  
function dist(a,b){return Math.hypot(a.x-b.x,a.y-b.y);}  

/******************** TERRAIN ********************/
function paintTerrain(){BG.clearRect(0,0,1010,1010);const fill=(set,col)=>{BG.fillStyle=col;set.forEach(id=>{const[x,y]=cellXY(id);BG.fillRect(x*SZ,y*SZ,SZ,SZ);});};fill(gas ,'rgba(0,120,255,.25)');fill(starT,'rgba(0,200,255,.6)');fill(gem ,'rgba(150,0,0,.25)');fill(sgem,'rgba(255,0,0,.6)');BG.fillStyle='purple';shop.forEach(id=>{const[x,y]=cellXY(id);BG.fillRect(x*SZ,y*SZ,SZ,SZ);});}

/******************** MOVE‑COST & RESOURCE READOUT ********************/
function computeMoveStats(){
  const statsSpan=document.getElementById('moveStats');
  if(phase[role]!=='move'){statsSpan.style.display='none';return;}

  let fuelGain=0,bucksGain=0,cost=0;

  for(let i=0;i<3;i++){
    const [ox,oy]=cellXY(oldShips[i]);
    const [nx,ny]=cellXY(ships[i]);
    const moveDist=Math.hypot(nx-ox,ny-oy);
    cost+=Math.max(radii[i],moveDist);            // mirrors server logic

    const id=ships[i];
    if(starT.has(id)) fuelGain+=40;
    else if(gas.has(id)) fuelGain+=20;

    if(sgem.has(id)) bucksGain+=20;
    else if(gem.has(id)) bucksGain+=10;
  }
  cost=Math.ceil(cost);
  const parts=[];
  parts.push(`Move Cost: -${cost} Fuel`);
  const resParts=[];
  if(bucksGain) resParts.push(`${bucksGain} Bucks`);
  if(fuelGain)  resParts.push(`${fuelGain} Fuel`);
  parts.push(`Resource Collection: ${resParts.join(', ')||'None'}`);

  statsSpan.textContent=parts.join(' — ');
  statsSpan.style.display='inline';
}

/******************** BARS (fuel‑cost circles) ********************/
const barsDiv=document.getElementById('bars');
function refreshBars(){barsDiv.innerHTML='';radii.forEach(r=>{const wrap=document.createElement('div');wrap.className='barWrap';const bar=document.createElement('div');bar.className='bar';bar.style.width=Math.min(r,20)*5+'%';wrap.appendChild(bar);barsDiv.appendChild(wrap);});}

/******************** RENDER ********************/
function drawBeaconArrow(x, y, dir, color) {
  ctx.fillStyle = color;
  ctx.save();
  ctx.translate(x * SZ + SZ / 2, y * SZ + SZ / 2);
  ctx.rotate((dir * Math.PI / 2) + 3 * Math.PI / 4);
  ctx.beginPath();
  ctx.moveTo(0, -6);
  ctx.lineTo(3, 6);
  ctx.lineTo(-3, 6);
  ctx.closePath();
  ctx.fill();
  ctx.restore();
}

function render(){if(gameEnded)return;clear();
  /* cost circles */
  ctx.strokeStyle='cyan';
  oldShips.forEach((o,i)=>{if(radii[i]>0){const[x,y]=cellXY(o);ctx.beginPath();ctx.arc(x*SZ+SZ/2,y*SZ+SZ/2,radii[i]*SZ,0,2*Math.PI);ctx.stroke();}});

  /* old & intel markers */
  ctx.strokeStyle='yellow';oldShips.forEach(id=>{if(!ships.includes(id)){const[x,y]=cellXY(id);ctx.strokeRect(x*SZ+1,y*SZ+1,SZ-2,SZ-2);}});
  ctx.strokeStyle='red';enemyOld.forEach(id=>{const[x,y]=cellXY(id);ctx.strokeRect(x*SZ+1,y*SZ+1,SZ-2,SZ-2);});
  Object.values(circleTog).forEach(o=>{if(o.v){const[x,y]=cellXY(o.id);ctx.strokeStyle='rgba(0,150,255,.4)';ctx.beginPath();ctx.arc(x*SZ+SZ/2,y*SZ+SZ/2,o.r*SZ,0,2*Math.PI);ctx.stroke();ctx.font='14px Orbitron';ctx.fillStyle='#fff';ctx.shadowColor='#000';ctx.shadowBlur=3;ctx.fillText(`+${o.c}F/+${o.b}B`,x*SZ+4,y*SZ-6);ctx.shadowBlur=0;}});

  /* ships & resource indicators */
  ships.forEach(id=>{
    const[x,y]=cellXY(id);
    drawTri(x,y,'#C0C0C0');                     // silver ship
    let resColor=null;
    if(shop.has(id))      resColor='purple';
    else if(sgem.has(id)) resColor='#ff0000';
    else if(gem.has(id))  resColor='#990000';
    else if(starT.has(id))resColor='#00c8ff';
    else if(gas.has(id))  resColor='#0078ff';
    if(resColor){
      ctx.fillStyle=resColor;
      ctx.beginPath();
      ctx.arc(x*SZ+SZ/2, y*SZ+SZ/2, SZ/2.8, 0, 2*Math.PI);
      ctx.fill();
    }
  });

  /* shots */
  shots.forEach(s=>{
    const r=s.type==='bomb'?BOMB_R:LASER_R;
    ctx.fillStyle=s.type==='bomb'?'rgba(255,0,0,0.25)':'rgba(0,255,0,0.25)';
    for(let dy=-r;dy<=r;dy++)for(let dx=-r;dx<=r;dx++){
      const x=s.x+dx,y=s.y+dy;
      if(x<0||y<0||x>=N||y>=N)continue;
      if(Math.hypot(dx,dy)<=r)ctx.fillRect(x*SZ,y*SZ,SZ,SZ);
    }
  });

  /* beacons */
  beacons.forEach(b=>{
    const[x,y]=cellXY(b.cell);
    drawBeaconArrow(x,y,b.dir,b.owner===role?'orange':'blue');
    if(b.owner===role){
      ctx.fillStyle=b.hit?'rgba(0,255,0,0.25)':'rgba(100,100,100,0.25)';
      const x0=x,y0=y,dx=b.dir===0||b.dir===3?N:0,dy=b.dir===0||b.dir===1?N:0;
      if(b.dir===1||b.dir===2)dx=0; else dx=N;
      if(b.dir===2||b.dir===3)dy=0; else dy=N;
      const width =(Math.abs(dx-x0))*SZ+SZ,
            height=(Math.abs(dy-y0))*SZ+SZ;
      ctx.fillRect(Math.min(x0,dx)*SZ,Math.min(y0,dy)*SZ,width,height);
    }
  });

  /* pending beacon preview */
  if(pendingBeacon){drawBeaconArrow(pendingBeacon.x,pendingBeacon.y,pendingBeacon.dir,'white');}
}

/******************** BASE PLACEMENT ********************/
const starDiv=document.getElementById('star');
function setStarPos(cell){starDiv.style.left=cell.x*SZ+'px';starDiv.style.top=cell.y*SZ+'px';}
ctx.canvas.addEventListener('mousedown',e=>{if(phase[role]!=='base')return;const c=canvasCell(e);if(!c)return;placingBase=true;baseCell=c;setStarPos(c);starDiv.style.display='block';});
ctx.canvas.addEventListener('mousemove',e=>{if(!placingBase)return;const c=canvasCell(e);if(!c)return;baseCell=c;setStarPos(c);});
window.addEventListener('mouseup',()=>{placingBase=false;});

/******************** WEAPON TOGGLE ********************/
document.getElementById('weapon').onclick=()=>{currentWeapon=currentWeapon==='laser'?'bomb':'laser';document.getElementById('weapon').textContent='Weapon: '+(currentWeapon==='laser'?'Laser':'Bomb');};

/******************** FIRING PHASE SHOTS ********************/
let shotDrag=null;
ctx.canvas.addEventListener('mousedown',e=>{
  if(phase[role]!=='fire'||e.button!==0)return;
  const c=canvasCell(e);if(!c)return;
  const idx=shots.findIndex(s=>dist(s,c)<= (s.type==='bomb'?BOMB_R:LASER_R));
  shotDrag=(idx>-1)?idx:(shots.length<3?shots.push({x:c.x,y:c.y,id:c.id,type:currentWeapon})-1:null);
  if(shotDrag!==null)updateShot(c,true);
});
ctx.canvas.addEventListener('mousemove',e=>{if(shotDrag===null)return;const c=canvasCell(e);if(c)updateShot(c,false);});
window.addEventListener('mouseup',()=>{shotDrag=null;});
function updateShot(c,forceType){
  if(forceType)shots[shotDrag].type=currentWeapon;
  const t=shots[shotDrag].type;
  if(t==='bomb'){
    const legal=ships.some(id=>distanceId(id,c.x,c.y)<=BOMB_RANGE);
    if(!legal)return;
  }
  Object.assign(shots[shotDrag],{x:c.x,y:c.y,id:c.id});
  render();
  document.getElementById('confirm').disabled=(shots.length<3);
}

/******************** ENEMY INTEL RIGHT‑CLICK ********************/
ctx.canvas.addEventListener('contextmenu',e=>e.preventDefault());
ctx.canvas.addEventListener('mousedown',e=>{
  if(e.button!==2)return;
  const c=canvasCell(e);if(!c)return;

  /* rotate pending beacon */
  if(pendingBeacon){pendingBeacon.dir=(pendingBeacon.dir+1)%4;render();return;}

  if(['move','fire'].includes(phase[role])){
    const idx=enemyOld.indexOf(c.id);
    if(idx>-1){
      const key=c.id;
      circleTog[key]=(circleTog[key])?({...circleTog[key],v:!circleTog[key].v}):{id:key,r:enemyRad[idx],c:enemyCr[idx],b:enemyBk[idx],v:true};
      render();
    }
  }
});

/******************** MOVE PHASE DRAGS ********************/
let dragShip=null,dragRad=null;
function distOld(i){const[oX,oY]=cellXY(oldShips[i]);const[nX,nY]=cellXY(ships[i]);return Math.hypot(oX-nX,oY-nY);}  
function sendMove(){socket.emit('move_packet',{ships:[...ships],radii:[...radii]});}

ctx.canvas.addEventListener('mousedown',e=>{
  if(phase[role]!=='move')return;
  const cell=canvasCell(e);if(!cell)return;

  /* beacon dragging */
  if(pendingBeacon){
    draggingBeacon=true;pendingBeacon={...pendingBeacon,x:cell.x,y:cell.y,id:cell.id};render();return;
  }

  if(e.button===0){
    const idx=ships.indexOf(cell.id);
    if(idx>-1){dragShip=idx;return;}
    for(let i=0;i<3;i++){
      const[oX,oY]=cellXY(oldShips[i]);
      if(Math.abs(Math.hypot(cell.x-oX,cell.y-oY)-radii[i])<=0.3){dragRad=i;return;}
    }
  }
});

ctx.canvas.addEventListener('mousemove',e=>{
  const cell=canvasCell(e);if(!cell)return;

  /* beacon preview */
  if(draggingBeacon&&pendingBeacon){
    pendingBeacon={...pendingBeacon,x:cell.x,y:cell.y,id:cell.id};
    render();return;
  }

  if(phase[role]!=='move')return;

  /* move ship */
  if(dragShip!==null){
    ships[dragShip]=cell.id;
    radii[dragShip]=distOld(dragShip);          // live‑update even when shrinking
    refreshBars();sendMove();render();computeMoveStats();return;
  }

  /* resize circle */
  if(dragRad!==null){
    const[oX,oY]=cellXY(oldShips[dragRad]);
    radii[dragRad]=Math.max(distOld(dragRad),Math.hypot(cell.x-oX,cell.y-oY));
    refreshBars();sendMove();render();computeMoveStats();
  }
});

window.addEventListener('mouseup',()=>{dragShip=null;dragRad=null;draggingBeacon=false;});

/******************** BUTTONS ********************/
document.getElementById('confirm').onclick=()=>{const payload=shots.map(s=>({cell:s.id,type:s.type}));socket.emit('fire_confirm',{shots:payload});};
document.getElementById('end').onclick=()=>{socket.emit('end_turn');document.getElementById('waiting').style.display='flex';};
document.getElementById('reset').onclick=()=>socket.emit('reset_request');
document.getElementById('baseOk').onclick=()=>{if(!baseCell)return;socket.emit('set_base',{cell:baseCell.id});};
document.getElementById('buyBeacon').onclick=()=>socket.emit('buy_beacon');
document.getElementById('confirmBeacon').onclick=()=>{if(!pendingBeacon)return;socket.emit('confirm_beacon',{cell:pendingBeacon.id,dir:pendingBeacon.dir});pendingBeacon=null;document.getElementById('confirmBeacon').style.display='none';render();};

/******************** SOCKET EVENTS ********************/
socket.on('role',d=>{
  role=d.role;ships=d.ships;document.getElementById('credits').textContent='Fuel '+d.credits;document.getElementById('bucks').textContent='Bucks '+d.bucks;
  gas=new Set(d.map.gas);starT=new Set(d.map.star);gem=new Set(d.map.gem);sgem=new Set(d.map.sgem);shop=new Set(d.map.shop);
  paintTerrain();
  if(d.needBase){phase[role]='base';starDiv.style.display='block';document.getElementById('baseOk').style.display='inline';}
  beacons=d.beacons;render();
});

socket.on('state',s=>{
  phase=s.phase;radii=[0,0,0];
  document.getElementById('credits').textContent='Fuel '+s.credits[role];
  document.getElementById('bucks').textContent='Bucks '+s.bucks[role];
  updateUI();
  if(phase[role]==='fire'){document.getElementById('waiting').style.display='none';shots=[];}
});

socket.on('base_confirmed',()=>{
  document.getElementById('baseOk').style.display='none';
  starDiv.style.pointerEvents='none';
  phase[role]='fire';
  updateUI();
});

socket.on('waiting',()=>document.getElementById('waiting').style.display='flex');

socket.on('start_move',d=>{
  oldShips=d.old;radii=[0,0,0];shots=[];refreshBars();updateUI();render();computeMoveStats();
});

socket.on('enemy_markers',d=>{
  enemyOld=d.old;enemyRad=d.rad;enemyCr=d.cr;enemyBk=d.bk;circleTog={};
  d.old.forEach((id,i)=>{circleTog[id]={id,r:d.rad[i],c:d.cr[i],b:d.bk[i],v:true}});
  render();
});

socket.on('result',d=>{const[x,y]=cellXY(d.cell);ctx.fillStyle=d.hit?'orange':'#555';ctx.fillRect(x*SZ+2,y*SZ+2,SZ-4,SZ-4);});

socket.on('opponent_guess',d=>{const[x,y]=cellXY(d.cell);ctx.fillStyle='rgba(0,180,255,.4)';ctx.fillRect(x*SZ+1,y*SZ+1,SZ-2,SZ-2);});

socket.on('reset',()=>location.reload());

socket.on('game_over',d=>{gameEnded=true;document.getElementById('overlay').textContent=(d.result==='victory'?'VICTORY!':'DEFEAT');document.getElementById('overlay').style.display='flex';});

socket.on('beacon_ready',()=>{
  pendingBeacon={x:50,y:50,id:toId(50,50),dir:0};
  document.getElementById('confirmBeacon').style.display='inline';
  updateUI();render();
});

socket.on('new_beacon',d=>{beacons.push(d);render();});

/******************** UI HELPER ********************/
function updateUI() {
  const weaponBtn   = document.getElementById('weapon');
  const confirmBtn  = document.getElementById('confirm');
  const endBtn      = document.getElementById('end');
  const buyBtn      = document.getElementById('buyBeacon');
  const confirmBBtn = document.getElementById('confirmBeacon');
  const statsSpan   = document.getElementById('moveStats');

  weaponBtn.style.display     = (phase[role]==='fire') ? 'inline' : 'none';
  confirmBBtn.style.display   = pendingBeacon ? 'inline' : 'none';
  statsSpan.style.display     = (phase[role]==='move') ? 'inline' : 'none';

  if(phase[role]==='fire'){
    confirmBtn.style.display='inline';
    endBtn.style.display='none';
    buyBtn.style.display='none';
    confirmBtn.disabled=(shots.length<3);
  }else if(phase[role]==='move'){
    confirmBtn.style.display='none';
    endBtn.style.display='inline';

    const shopDiscount=ships.some(s=>shop.has(s));
    const beaconCost  = shopDiscount?15:25;
    buyBtn.style.display='inline';
    buyBtn.textContent=`Buy Beacon $${beaconCost}`;
    buyBtn.disabled=(gameEnded||pendingBeacon);
    computeMoveStats();
  }else{
    confirmBtn.style.display='none';
    endBtn.style.display='none';
    buyBtn.style.display='none';
    statsSpan.style.display='none';
  }
}
</script>
</body>

python
import eventlet, math, random
from flask import Flask, render_template, request
from flask_socketio import SocketIO, emit

eventlet.monkey_patch()

# ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# CONSTANTS
# ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
BOARD        = 101
NUM_SHIPS    = 3

LASER_RADIUS = 5
BOMB_RADIUS  = 2
BOMB_RANGE   = 8          # bomb must be ≤ 8 from a friendly ship
SHOT_LIMIT   = 3

HIT_CREDIT   = 100        # credits per laser hit on enemy ship

# terrain rewards
GAS_CR  = 20
STAR_CR = 40
GEM_BU  = 10
SGEM_BU = 20

BEACON_COST   = 25        # default
BEACON_SALE   = 15        # if any ship sits on a shop

# directions: 0 = ↘, 1 = ↗, 2 = ↖, 3 = ↙
DIR_VECT = [(1,1),(1,-1),(-1,-1),(-1,1)]

# ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# FIXED TERRAIN MAP
# ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
def oval(cx, cy, rx, ry):
    """Generate a fixed oval (may spill off board)."""
    for y in range(cy - ry, cy + ry + 1):
        for x in range(cx - rx, cx + rx + 1):
            if ((x - cx) / rx) ** 2 + ((y - cy) / ry) ** 2 < 1:
                yield y * BOARD + x

gas, star, gem, sgem, shop = set(), set(), set(), set(), set()
# …  (unchanged terrain generation – identical to previous version)

# ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# GAME DATA STRUCTURES
# ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
def start_pos():
    c = BOARD // 2
    return [c*BOARD + c, c*BOARD + (c-1), (c-1)*BOARD + c]

game = {p: {'sid': None, 'ships': start_pos(), 'old': [],
            'credits': 0, 'bucks': 0, 'base': None}
        for p in ('X', 'O')}

player_phase  = {'X': 'base', 'O': 'base'}
moves_pending = {'X': None,  'O': None}
players       = {}                 # sid ➜ role
beacons       = []                 # {'owner','cell','dir','hit'}
game_over     = False

# ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# HELPERS
# ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
def dist_cells(a, b):
    ar, ac = divmod(a, BOARD)
    br, bc = divmod(b, BOARD)
    return math.hypot(ar - br, ac - bc)

def pub_state():
    return {'phase': player_phase,
            'credits': {p: game[p]['credits'] for p in ('X', 'O')},
            'bucks':  {p: game[p]['bucks']   for p in ('X', 'O')}}

def send_state():
    socketio.emit('state', pub_state())

# ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# FLASK / SOCKET.IO APP
# ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
app = Flask(__name__)
socketio = SocketIO(app)

@app.route('/')
def index():
    return render_template('index.html')

# ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
#  (All socket handlers remain exactly the same as earlier.)
# ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# …  The remainder of the server file is identical to the
#    previously working version you supplied.
# ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────

if __name__ == '__main__':
    socketio.run(app, host='0.0.0.0', port=5000, debug=True)

What changed?

  1. Real‑time cost‑circle feedback

    • Ship‑drag and radius‑drag handlers now update radii[i] continuously (both expanding and shrinking) and immediately re‑render.

  2. Silver ships with resource pips

    • Ships are now rendered in silver (#C0C0C0).

    • When a ship occupies gas, star, gem, super‑gem, or shop terrain, a colored dot appears at its center using that resource’s hue.

  3. Live move‑cost & resource readout

    • A new <span id="moveStats"> is shown only during the move phase.

    • It recalculates (a) the fuel cost of moves (ceil of Σ max(distance, radius)) and (b) fuel/bucks gained from terrain every time a ship or cost circle moves.

ChatGPT said:

Below is a single‑file hot‑fix for the front‑end ( index.html ).
Nothing in app.py needs to change—the server is already handling live move packets correctly.

What was wrong?

  • Dragging logic required you to start the drag on the exact grid cell that presently contains the ship.
    With the small triangle sprite it’s easy to click on the lower edge of the graphic (which is actually the next cell down), so ships.indexOf(cell.id) often failed and no drag began.

What changed?

  1. More forgiving pick‑up test – a ship can now be grabbed from any of the 8 neighboring cells that visually overlap its triangle.

  2. Window‑level pointer tracking – once a drag starts, movement continues even if the cursor strays outside the canvas (smoother feel).

  3. A tiny cursor cue (cursor:grab/grabbing) while dragging.

Replace your current index.html with the version below and reload the page (no backend restart needed).

function distOld(i){
  const[oX,oY]=cellXY(oldShips[i]);
  const[nX,nY]=cellXY(ships[i]);
  return Math.hypot(oX-nX,oY-nY);
}

/* helper: find ship index even if click hits any neighboring cell */
function shipAtCell(cell){
  let idx=ships.indexOf(cell.id);
  if(idx>-1) return idx;
  return ships.findIndex(s=>distanceId(s,cell.x,cell.y)<=1.1);   // ±1 cell tolerance
}

CANVAS.addEventListener('mousedown',e=>{
  if(phase[role]!=='move') return;
  const cell=canvasCell(e); if(!cell) return;

  /* beacon dragging takes priority */
  if(pendingBeacon){
    draggingBeacon=true;
    pendingBeacon={...pendingBeacon,x:cell.x,y:cell.y,id:cell.id};
    render();
    return;
  }

  if(e.button===0){
    const idx=shipAtCell(cell);
    if(idx>-1){                                  // start ship drag
      dragShip=idx; isDragging=true; CANVAS.classList.add('grabbing'); return;
    }
    /* radius grab (unchanged test) */
    for(let i=0;i<3;i++){
      const[oX,oY]=cellXY(oldShips[i]);
      if(Math.abs(Math.hypot(cell.x-oX,cell.y-oY)-radii[i])<=0.3){
        dragRad=i; isDragging=true; CANVAS.classList.add('grabbing'); return;
      }
    }
  }
});

window.addEventListener('mousemove',e=>{
  if(!isDragging) return;
  const cell=canvasCell(e); if(!cell) return;

  /* beacon preview */
  if(draggingBeacon && pendingBeacon){
    pendingBeacon={...pendingBeacon,x:cell.x,y:cell.y,id:cell.id};
    render(); return;
  }

  if(dragShip!==null){
    ships[dragShip]=cell.id;
    radii[dragShip]=distOld(dragShip);
    refreshBars(); sendMove(); render(); computeMoveStats(); return;
  }

  if(dragRad!==null){
    const[oX,oY]=cellXY(oldShips[dragRad]);
    radii[dragRad]=Math.max(distOld(dragRad),Math.hypot(cell.x-oX,cell.y-oY));
    refreshBars(); sendMove(); render(); computeMoveStats();
  }
});

window.addEventListener('mouseup',()=>{
  dragShip=dragRad=null; draggingBeacon=false;
  if(isDragging){ CANVAS.classList.remove('grabbing'); }
  isDragging=false;
});

ChatGPT said:

Here’s the one‑line patch you need inside confirm_beacon() in app.py.
Replace the part that chooses x1 and y1 so they follow the same rule the front‑end uses (dirs 0/3 go to the right edge, dirs 0/1 go to the bottom edge).
Everything else stays exactly the same.

python
# --- old code ----------------------------------------------------
dx, dy = DIR_VECT[dir]
x1 = 100 if dx == 1 else 0
y1 = 100 if dy == 1 else 0
# ----------------------------------------------------------------

# --- new code: rectangle that matches the client visual ----------
# dir 0 (↘) and 3 (↙) extend to the RIGHT edge; 1,2 go LEFT.
x1 = 100 if dir in (0, 3) else 0
# dir 0 (↘) and 1 (↗) extend to the BOTTOM edge; 2,3 go TOP.
y1 = 100 if dir in (0, 1) else 0
# ----------------------------------------------------------------

So the full section becomes:

python
# check if opponent base lies in rectangle
opp = 'O' if role == 'X' else 'X'
bx = by = None
if game[opp]['base'] is not None:
    bx, by = divmod(game[opp]['base'], BOARD)[::-1]

x0, y0 = divmod(cell, BOARD)[::-1]

# use the same quadrant rule the front‑end uses
x1 = 100 if dir in (0, 3) else 0
y1 = 100 if dir in (0, 1) else 0

hit = False
if bx is not None:
    if min(x0, x1) <= bx <= max(x0, x1) and \
       min(y0, y1) <= by <= max(y0, y1):
        hit = True

Why this fixes it

  • The front‑end draws the detection rectangle with:
    * x1 = N when dir is 0 or 3, else 0
    * y1 = N when dir is 0 or 1, else 0

  • The server used a different rule based on DIR_VECT, effectively flipping the rectangle 180 degrees for dirs 1 and 3.
    Matching the front‑end’s rule brings the hit test into perfect alignment.

Just save the change and restart your Flask server; no client‑side edits are required. Let me know if everything lines up now!

        for x in range(cx - rx, cx + rx + 1):
            if ((x - cx) / rx) ** 2 + ((y - cy) / ry) ** 2 < 1:
                yield y * BOARD + x

def index():
    return render_template('index.html')

# ── CONNECT / DISCONNECT ─────────────────────────────────
@socketio.on('connect')
def on_connect():
    sid  = request.sid
    if game_over:
        emit('message','Match finished – wait for reset.'); return

    role = 'X' if game['X']['sid'] is None else ('O' if game['O']['sid'] is None else None)
    if role is None:
        emit('message','Game full.'); return

    players[sid]       = role
    game[role]['sid']  = sid
    player_phase[role] = 'fire' if game[role]['base'] else 'base'

    emit('role',{
        'role'    : role,
        'ships'   : game[role]['ships'],
        'credits' : game[role]['credits'],
        'bucks'   : game[role]['bucks'],
        'needBase': game[role]['base'] is None,
        'map': {'gas':list(gas),'star':list(star),'gem':list(gem),
                'sgem':list(sgem),'shop':list(shop)},
        'beacons'    : beacons,
        'harvesters' : harvesters
    })
    send_state()

@socketio.on('disconnect')
def on_disconnect():
    sid = request.sid
    role = players.pop(sid, None)
    if role:
        game[role]['sid'] = None
        send_state()

# ── BASE PLACEMENT ──────────────────────────────────────
@socketio.on('set_base')
def set_base(data):
    role = players.get(request.sid)
    if role and player_phase[role]=='base':
        cell = data.get('cell')
        if isinstance(cell,int) and 0 <= cell < BOARD*BOARD:
            game[role]['base'] = cell
            player_phase[role] = 'fire'
            emit('base_confirmed')
            send_state()

# ── SHOP / UPGRADES  ────────────────────────────────────
@socketio.on('shop_purchase')
def shop_purchase(data):
    role = players.get(request.sid)
    if role is None or player_phase[role] != 'move': return

    item = data.get('item')
    if item not in PRICES: return

    cost = PRICES[item] - discount(role)
    if game[role]['bucks'] < cost: return
    game[role]['bucks'] -= cost

    if item == 'beacon':
        emit('beacon_ready', room=request.sid)
    elif item == 'harvester':
        emit('harvester_ready', room=request.sid)
    else:
        # simple upgrades
        game[role]['upg'][item] += 1
        send_state()

# ── CONFIRM HARBESTER ───────────────────────────────────
@socketio.on('confirm_harvester')
def confirm_harvester(data):
    role = players.get(request.sid)
    if role is None or player_phase[role] != 'move': return
    cell = data.get('cell')
    if not isinstance(cell,int) or not (0<=cell<BOARD*BOARD): return
    harvester = {'owner':role,'cell':cell}
    harvesters.append(harvester)
    socketio.emit('new_harvester',harvester)

# existing BUY BEACON kept for compatibility ----------------------
@socketio.on('buy_beacon')
def legacy_beacon():
    shop_purchase({'item':'beacon'})

# ── CONFIRM BEACON (unchanged) ───────────────────────────────────
@socketio.on('confirm_beacon')
def confirm_beacon(data):
    role = players.get(request.sid)
    if role is None or player_phase[role] != 'move': return
    cell = data.get('cell'); dir = data.get('dir')
    if not isinstance(cell,int) or dir not in (0,1,2,3): return

    # rectangle bounds (match client)
    opp = 'O' if role=='X' else 'X'
    bx = by = None
    if game[opp]['base'] is not None:
        bx,by = divmod(game[opp]['base'],BOARD)[::-1]

    x0,y0 = divmod(cell,BOARD)[::-1]
    x1 = 100 if dir in (0,3) else 0
    y1 = 100 if dir in (0,1) else 0
    hit=False
    if bx is not None:
        if min(x0,x1)<=bx<=max(x0,x1) and min(y0,y1)<=by<=max(y0,y1):
            hit=True

    beacon={'owner':role,'cell':cell,'dir':dir,'hit':hit}
    beacons.append(beacon)
    socketio.emit('new_beacon',beacon)

# ── LIVE MOVE PACKETS (unchanged, but no preview maths here) ------
@socketio.on('move_packet')
def move_packet(data):
    role = players.get(request.sid)
    if role and player_phase[role]=='move':
        moves_pending[role]=data

# ── FIRING PHASE CONFIRM ─────────────────────────────────────────
@socketio.on('fire_confirm')
def fire_confirm(data):
    global game_over
    role = players.get(request.sid)
    if game_over or role is None or player_phase[role] != 'fire': return

    opp = 'O' if role=='X' else 'X'
    upg = game[role]['upg']
    shot_lim = BASE_SHOT_LIMIT + upg['laser_shots']
    shots    = data.get('shots',[])[:shot_lim]
    if len(shots) < shot_lim:
        emit('message','Place all shots before confirming.'); return

    laser_r = BASE_LASER_RADIUS + upg['laser_spread']

    for s in shots:
        cell=s.get('cell'); wtype=s.get('type')
        if not isinstance(cell,int) or wtype not in ('laser','bomb'): continue
        if wtype=='bomb' and all(dist_cells(cell,sh)>BOMB_RANGE for sh in game[role]['ships']): continue

        emit('result',{'cell':cell,'hit':False,'type':wtype},room=game[role]['sid'])
        if game[opp]['sid']:
            emit('opponent_guess',{'cell':cell,'type':wtype},room=game[opp]['sid'])

        if wtype=='laser':
            for sh in game[opp]['ships']:
                if dist_cells(cell,sh) <= laser_r:
                    game[role]['credits'] += HIT_CREDIT
                    emit('result',{'cell':cell,'hit':True,'type':wtype},room=game[role]['sid'])
                    break
        else:
            base = game[opp]['base']
            if base and dist_cells(cell,base) <= BOMB_RADIUS:
                whistle_victory(role,opp); return

    # advance to move phase
    game[role]['old']  = game[role]['ships'][:]
    player_phase[role] = 'move'
    emit('start_move',{'old':game[role]['old']})
    send_state()

# ── END TURN & RESOLUTION ────────────────────────────────────────
@socketio.on('end_turn')
def end_turn():
    role = players.get(request.sid)
    if role is None or player_phase[role] != 'move': return
    if moves_pending[role] is None:   # no‑move
        moves_pending[role]={'ships':game[role]['old'][:],'radii':[0,0,0]}
    player_phase[role]='done'
    emit('waiting')
    resolve_if_both_done()

def resolve_if_both_done():
    if player_phase['X']!='done' or player_phase['O']!='done':
        send_state(); return

    gains={'X':{'fuel':0,'bucks':0}, 'O':{'fuel':0,'bucks':0}}

    for role in ('X','O'):
        mp      = moves_pending[role]
        ships   = mp['ships']; radii=mp['radii']
        upg     = game[role]['upg']
        fixed   = [max(r, dist_cells(o,n)) for o,n,r in zip(game[role]['old'],ships,radii)]

        # ship‑based resources
        for s in ships:
            if s in star: gains[role]['fuel'] += STAR_CR + upg['gasman']*GASMAN_BONUS[1]
            elif s in gas: gains[role]['fuel'] += GAS_CR + upg['gasman']*GASMAN_BONUS[0]

            if s in sgem: gains[role]['bucks'] += SGEM_BU + upg['plunder']*PLUNDER_BONUS[1]
            elif s in gem: gains[role]['bucks'] += GEM_BU + upg['plunder']*PLUNDER_BONUS[0]

        # harvester resources (1/5th)
        for h in harvesters:
            if h['owner']!=role: continue
            s=h['cell']
            if s in star: gains[role]['fuel'] += (STAR_CR + upg['gasman']*GASMAN_BONUS[1])//5
            elif s in gas: gains[role]['fuel'] += (GAS_CR + upg['gasman']*GASMAN_BONUS[0])//5
            if s in sgem: gains[role]['bucks'] += (SGEM_BU + upg['plunder']*PLUNDER_BONUS[1])//5
            elif s in gem: gains[role]['bucks'] += (GEM_BU + upg['plunder']*PLUNDER_BONUS[0])//5

        game[role]['ships']   = ships
        game[role]['credits'] += gains[role]['fuel'] - math.ceil(sum(fixed))
        game[role]['bucks']  += gains[role]['bucks']

    # send enemy gains to each player
    for viewer,enemy in (('X','O'),('O','X')):
        if game[viewer]['sid']:
            emit('enemy_gains', gains[enemy], room=game[viewer]['sid'])

    last_gain.update(gains)

    # reset for next turn
    moves_pending['X']=moves_pending['O']=None
    player_phase['X']=player_phase['O']='fire'
    send_state()

# ── RESET ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
@socketio.on('reset_request')
def reset_request():
    global game_over, beacons, harvesters
    game_over=False; beacons=[]; harvesters=[]
    for p in ('X','O'):
        game[p]=blank_player()
        player_phase[p]='base'
        moves_pending[p]=None
    socketio.emit('reset')
    send_state()

# ── VICTORY  ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────
def whistle_victory(winner,loser):
    global game_over
    game_over=True
    if game[winner]['sid']:
        emit('game_over',{'result':'victory'},room=game[winner]['sid'])
    if game[loser]['sid']:
        emit('game_over',{'result':'defeat'},room=game[loser]['sid'])

# ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
if __name__ == '__main__':
    socketio.run(app, host='0.0.0.0', port=5000, debug=True)

<script>
/******************** CONSTANTS & CANVAS ********************/
const SZ=10,N=101,BASE_LASER_R=5,BOMB_R=2,BOMB_RANGE=8;
const BG=document.getElementById('bg').getContext('2d');
const ctx=document.getElementById('draw').getContext('2d');
const socket=io();

/******************** STATE *******************************/
let role=null,phase={X:'base',O:'base'};
let ships=[],oldShips=[],radii=[0,0,0];
let gas=new Set(),starT=new Set(),gem=new Set(),sgem=new Set(),shop=new Set();
let beacons=[],harvesters=[];
let enemyOld=[],enemyRad=[],circleTog={};
let shots=[],currentWeapon='laser';
let baseCell=null,placingBase=false,gameEnded=false;

/* upgrades */
let upg={laser_spread:0,laser_shots:0};

/* placement helpers */
let pendingBeacon=null,pendingHarv=null,draggingBeacon=false;

/******************** UTILS *******************************/
const cellXY=id=>[id%N,Math.floor(id/N)];
const toId =(x,y)=>y*N+x;
function canvasCell(e){const r=ctx.canvas.getBoundingClientRect();const x=Math.floor((e.clientX-r.left)/SZ),y=Math.floor((e.clientY-r.top)/SZ);return (x>=0&&y>=0&&x<N&&y<N)?{x,y,id:toId(x,y)}:null;}
function clearDraw(){ctx.clearRect(0,0,1010,1010);}
function drawTri(x,y){const size=4*SZ,cx=x*SZ+SZ/2,cy=y*SZ;ctx.fillStyle='silver';ctx.beginPath();ctx.moveTo(cx,cy);ctx.lineTo(cx-size/2,cy+size);ctx.lineTo(cx+size/2,cy+size);ctx.closePath();ctx.fill();}
function drawSquare(x,y,color){ctx.fillStyle=color;ctx.fillRect(x*SZ+2,y*SZ+2,SZ-4,SZ-4);}
function distanceId(id,x,y){const[xx,yy]=cellXY(id);return Math.hypot(x-xx,y-yy);}

/******************** TERRAIN BACKGROUND *******************/
function paintTerrain(){
  BG.clearRect(0,0,1010,1010);
  const fill=(set,col)=>{BG.fillStyle=col;set.forEach(id=>{const[x,y]=cellXY(id);BG.fillRect(x*SZ,y*SZ,SZ,SZ);});};
  fill(gas,'rgba(0,120,255,.25)'); fill(starT,'rgba(0,200,255,.6)');
  fill(gem,'rgba(150,0,0,.25)');  fill(sgem,'rgba(255,0,0,.6)');
  BG.fillStyle='purple'; shop.forEach(id=>{const[x,y]=cellXY(id);BG.fillRect(x*SZ,y*SZ,SZ,SZ);});
}

/******************** BARS (cost‑circle) *******************/
const barsDiv=document.getElementById('bars');
function refreshBars(){barsDiv.innerHTML='';radii.forEach(r=>{const w=document.createElement('div');w.className='barWrap';const b=document.createElement('div');b.className='bar';b.style.width=Math.min(r,20)*5+'%';w.appendChild(b);barsDiv.appendChild(w);});}

/******************** RENDER ********************************/
function drawBeaconArrow(x,y,dir,color){ctx.fillStyle=color;ctx.save();ctx.translate(x*SZ+SZ/2,y*SZ+SZ/2);ctx.rotate((dir*Math.PI/2)+3*Math.PI/4);ctx.beginPath();ctx.moveTo(0,-6);ctx.lineTo(3,6);ctx.lineTo(-3,6);ctx.closePath();ctx.fill();ctx.restore();}

function render(){
  if(gameEnded)return;
  clearDraw();

  /* cost circles */
  ctx.strokeStyle='cyan';
  oldShips.forEach((o,i)=>{if(radii[i]>0){const[x,y]=cellXY(o);ctx.beginPath();ctx.arc(x*SZ+SZ/2,y*SZ+SZ/2,radii[i]*SZ,0,2*Math.PI);ctx.stroke();}});

  /* markers */
  ctx.strokeStyle='yellow';
  oldShips.forEach(id=>{if(!ships.includes(id)){const[x,y]=cellXY(id);ctx.strokeRect(x*SZ+1,y*SZ+1,SZ-2,SZ-2);}});
  ctx.strokeStyle='red';
  enemyOld.forEach(id=>{const[x,y]=cellXY(id);ctx.strokeRect(x*SZ+1,y*SZ+1,SZ-2,SZ-2);});

  /* intel circles (no +text now) */
  Object.values(circleTog).forEach(o=>{if(o.v){const[x,y]=cellXY(o.id);ctx.strokeStyle='rgba(0,150,255,.4)';ctx.beginPath();ctx.arc(x*SZ+SZ/2,y*SZ+SZ/2,o.r*SZ,0,2*Math.PI);ctx.stroke();}});

  /* ships */
  ships.forEach(id=>{const[x,y]=cellXY(id);drawTri(x,y);});

  /* harvesters */
  harvesters.forEach(h=>{const[x,y]=cellXY(h.cell);drawSquare(x,y,h.owner===role?'#00f':'#f00');});

  /* shots */
  shots.forEach(s=>{
    const r=s.type==='bomb'?BOMB_R:BASE_LASER_R+upg.laser_spread;
    ctx.fillStyle=s.type==='bomb'?'rgba(255,0,0,.25)':'rgba(0,255,0,.25)';
    for(let dy=-r;dy<=r;dy++)for(let dx=-r;dx<=r;dx++){
      const x=s.x+dx,y=s.y+dy;
      if(x<0||y<0||x>=N||y>=N)continue;
      if(Math.hypot(dx,dy)<=r)ctx.fillRect(x*SZ,y*SZ,SZ,SZ);
    }
  });

  /* beacons */
  beacons.forEach(b=>{
    const[x,y]=cellXY(b.cell);
    drawBeaconArrow(x,y,b.dir,b.owner===role?'orange':'blue');
  });

  /* placement previews */
  if(pendingBeacon)  drawBeaconArrow(pendingBeacon.x,pendingBeacon.y,pendingBeacon.dir,'white');
  if(pendingHarv){const[x,y]=[pendingHarv.x,pendingHarv.y];drawSquare(x,y,'#0ff');}
}

/******************** BASE PLACEMENT **********************/
const starDiv=document.getElementById('star');
function setStarPos(cell){starDiv.style.left=cell.x*SZ+'px';starDiv.style.top=cell.y*SZ+'px';}
ctx.canvas.addEventListener('mousedown',e=>{
  if(phase[role]!=='base')return;
  const c=canvasCell(e);if(!c)return;
  placingBase=true;baseCell=c;setStarPos(c);starDiv.style.display='block';
});
ctx.canvas.addEventListener('mousemove',e=>{
  if(!placingBase)return;
  const c=canvasCell(e);if(c){baseCell=c;setStarPos(c);}
});
window.addEventListener('mouseup',()=>placingBase=false);

/******************** WEAPON TOGGLE ***********************/
document.getElementById('weapon').onclick=()=>{
  currentWeapon=currentWeapon==='laser'?'bomb':'laser';
  document.getElementById('weapon').textContent='Weapon: '+(currentWeapon==='laser'?'Laser':'Bomb');
};

/******************** SHOP MENU ***************************/
const shopBtn=document.getElementById('shopBtn');
const shopMenu=document.getElementById('shopMenu');
shopBtn.onclick=e=>{
  e.stopPropagation();
  shopMenu.style.display = shopMenu.style.display==='block'?'none':'block';
};
window.addEventListener('click',()=>shopMenu.style.display='none');

/* click handlers for each item */
shopMenu.querySelectorAll('button').forEach(btn=>{
  btn.onclick=()=>{
    socket.emit('shop_purchase',{item:btn.dataset.item});
    shopMenu.style.display='none';
  };
});

/******************** FIRING SHOTS ************************/
let shotDrag=null;
function shotRadius(){return BASE_LASER_R+upg.laser_spread;}

ctx.canvas.addEventListener('mousedown',e=>{
  if(phase[role]!=='fire'||e.button!==0)return;
  const c=canvasCell(e);if(!c)return;
  const rad=shotRadius();
  const idx=shots.findIndex(s=>Math.hypot(s.x-c.x,s.y-c.y)<= (s.type==='bomb'?BOMB_R:rad));
  const limit=3+upg.laser_shots;
  shotDrag=(idx>-1)?idx:(shots.length<limit?shots.push({x:c.x,y:c.y,id:c.id,type:currentWeapon})-1:null);
  if(shotDrag!==null)updateShot(c,true);
});

ctx.canvas.addEventListener('mousemove',e=>{
  if(shotDrag===null)return;
  const c=canvasCell(e);if(c)updateShot(c,false);
});
window.addEventListener('mouseup',()=>shotDrag=null);

function updateShot(c,forceType){
  if(forceType)shots[shotDrag].type=currentWeapon;
  if(shots[shotDrag].type==='bomb'){
    const legal=ships.some(id=>distanceId(id,c.x,c.y)<=BOMB_RANGE);
    if(!legal)return;
  }
  Object.assign(shots[shotDrag],{x:c.x,y:c.y,id:c.id});
  render();
  document.getElementById('confirm').disabled=(shots.length<3+upg.laser_shots);
}

/******************** ENEMY INTEL RIGHT‑CLICK (toggle circle) *****/
ctx.canvas.addEventListener('contextmenu',e=>e.preventDefault());
ctx.canvas.addEventListener('mousedown',e=>{
  if(e.button!==2)return;
  const c=canvasCell(e);if(!c)return;
  if(pendingBeacon){pendingBeacon.dir=(pendingBeacon.dir+1)%4;render();return;}
  const idx=enemyOld.indexOf(c.id);
  if(idx>-1){
    const key=c.id;
    circleTog[key]=circleTog[key]?({...circleTog[key],v:!circleTog[key].v}):{id:key,r:enemyRad[idx],v:true};
    render();
  }
});

/******************** MOVE DRAGGING *******************************/
let dragShip=null,dragRad=null;
function distOld(i){const[oX,oY]=cellXY(oldShips[i]);const[nX,nY]=cellXY(ships[i]);return Math.hypot(oX-nX,oY-nY);}
function sendMove(){socket.emit('move_packet',{ships:[...ships],radii:[...radii]});}

ctx.canvas.addEventListener('mousedown',e=>{
  if(phase[role]!=='move')return;
  const cell=canvasCell(e);if(!cell)return;

  /* beacon & harv placement */
  if(pendingBeacon){draggingBeacon=true;pendingBeacon={...pendingBeacon,x:cell.x,y:cell.y,id:cell.id};render();return;}
  if(pendingHarv){pendingHarv={...pendingHarv,x:cell.x,y:cell.y,id:cell.id};render();return;}

  if(e.button===0){
    const idx=ships.indexOf(cell.id);
    if(idx>-1){dragShip=idx;return;}
    /* radius ring pick */
    for(let i=0;i<3;i++){
      const[oX,oY]=cellXY(oldShips[i]);
      if(Math.abs(Math.hypot(cell.x-oX,cell.y-oY)-radii[i])<=.3){dragRad=i;return;}
    }
  }
});
ctx.canvas.addEventListener('mousemove',e=>{
  const cell=canvasCell(e);if(!cell)return;
  if(draggingBeacon&&pendingBeacon){pendingBeacon={...pendingBeacon,x:cell.x,y:cell.y,id:cell.id};render();return;}
  if(pendingHarv){pendingHarv={...pendingHarv,x:cell.x,y:cell.y,id:cell.id};render();return;}

  if(dragShip!==null){
    ships[dragShip]=cell.id;
    radii[dragShip]=Math.max(radii[dragShip],distOld(dragShip));
    refreshBars();sendMove();render();
  }else if(dragRad!==null){
    const[oX,oY]=cellXY(oldShips[dragRad]);
    radii[dragRad]=Math.max(distOld(dragRad),Math.hypot(cell.x-oX,cell.y-oY));
    refreshBars();sendMove();render();
  }
});
window.addEventListener('mouseup',()=>{dragShip=dragRad=null;draggingBeacon=false;});

/******************** BUTTONS ************************************/
document.getElementById('confirm').onclick=()=>{
  socket.emit('fire_confirm',{shots:shots.map(s=>({cell:s.id,type:s.type}))});
};
document.getElementById('end').onclick=()=>{
  socket.emit('end_turn');document.getElementById('waiting').style.display='flex';
};
document.getElementById('reset').onclick=()=>socket.emit('reset_request');
document.getElementById('baseOk').onclick=()=>{if(baseCell)socket.emit('set_base',{cell:baseCell.id});};
document.getElementById('confirmBeacon').onclick=()=>{
  if(!pendingBeacon)return;
  socket.emit('confirm_beacon',{cell:pendingBeacon.id,dir:pendingBeacon.dir});
  pendingBeacon=null;this.style.display='none';render();
};
document.getElementById('confirmHarvester').onclick=()=>{
  if(!pendingHarv)return;
  socket.emit('confirm_harvester',{cell:pendingHarv.id});
  pendingHarv=null;this.style.display='none';render();
};

/******************** SOCKET EVENTS *******************************/
socket.on('role',d=>{
  role=d.role;ships=d.ships;upg={laser_spread:0,laser_shots:0};
  document.getElementById('credits').textContent='Fuel '+d.credits;
  document.getElementById('bucks').textContent='Bucks '+d.bucks;
  gas=new Set(d.map.gas);starT=new Set(d.map.star);gem=new Set(d.map.gem);
  sgem=new Set(d.map.sgem);shop=new Set(d.map.shop);
  beacons=d.beacons;harvesters=d.harvesters;
  paintTerrain();
  if(d.needBase){phase[role]='base';starDiv.style.display='block';document.getElementById('baseOk').style.display='inline';}
  render();
});

socket.on('state',s=>{
  phase=s.phase;document.getElementById('credits').textContent='Fuel '+s.credits[role];
  document.getElementById('bucks').textContent='Bucks '+s.bucks[role];
  if(phase[role]==='fire'){shots.length=0;document.getElementById('waiting').style.display='none';}
  updateUI();
});

socket.on('start_move',d=>{
  oldShips=d.old;radii=[0,0,0];refreshBars();updateUI();render();
});

socket.on('enemy_markers',d=>{
  enemyOld=d.old;enemyRad=d.rad;circleTog={};
  d.old.forEach((id,i)=>circleTog[id]={id,r:d.rad[i],v:true});
  render();
});

socket.on('result',d=>{const[x,y]=cellXY(d.cell);ctx.fillStyle=d.hit?'orange':'#555';ctx.fillRect(x*SZ+2,y*SZ+2,SZ-4,SZ-4);});
socket.on('opponent_guess',d=>{const[x,y]=cellXY(d.cell);ctx.fillStyle='rgba(0,180,255,.4)';ctx.fillRect(x*SZ+1,y*SZ+1,SZ-2,SZ-2);});
socket.on('reset',()=>location.reload());
socket.on('game_over',d=>{gameEnded=true;document.getElementById('overlay').textContent=d.result==='victory'?'VICTORY!':'DEFEAT';document.getElementById('overlay').style.display='flex';});

socket.on('beacon_ready',()=>{pendingBeacon={x:50,y:50,id:toId(50,50),dir:0};document.getElementById('confirmBeacon').style.display='inline';updateUI();render();});
socket.on('harvester_ready',()=>{pendingHarv={x:50,y:50,id:toId(50,50)};document.getElementById('confirmHarvester').style.display='inline';updateUI();render();});
socket.on('new_beacon',d=>{beacons.push(d);render();});
socket.on('new_harvester',d=>{harvesters.push(d);render();});

socket.on('enemy_gains',d=>{
  const e=document.getElementById('enemyInfo');
  e.textContent=`Enemy Collection: ${d.bucks} Bucks, ${d.fuel} Fuel`;
});

/******************** UI HELPER **********************************/
function updateUI(){
  const w=document.getElementById('weapon'),c=document.getElementById('confirm'),
        ebtn=document.getElementById('end'),shopB=shopBtn,
        confB=document.getElementById('confirmBeacon'),confH=document.getElementById('confirmHarvester'),
        mInfo=document.getElementById('moveInfo'),enemyInfo=document.getElementById('enemyInfo');

  w.style.display=(phase[role]==='fire')?'inline':'none';
  enemyInfo.style.display=(phase[role]==='fire')?'inline':'none';
  confB.style.display=pendingBeacon?'inline':'none';
  confH.style.display=pendingHarv?'inline':'none';

  if(phase[role]==='fire'){
    c.style.display='inline';c.disabled=(shots.length<3+upg.laser_shots);
    ebtn.style.display='none';shopB.style.display='none';mInfo.style.display='none';
  }else if(phase[role]==='move'){
    c.style.display='none';ebtn.style.display='inline';shopB.style.display='inline';
    mInfo.style.display='inline';
    /* update costs based on discount */
    const disc=ships.some(s=>shop.has(s))?10:0;
    shopMenu.querySelectorAll('button').forEach(b=>{
      const base=parseInt(b.textContent.split('$')[1],10);
      b.textContent=b.textContent.split('$')[0].replace(/\d+$/,'')+'$'+(base-disc);
    });
  }else{
    c.style.display='none';ebtn.style.display='none';shopB.style.display='none';mInfo.style.display='none';enemyInfo.style.display='none';
  }
}

</script>
</body>
</html>

### Key changes & usage

  1. Enemy resource display

    • During each firing phase you’ll see “Enemy Collection: …” beside the Confirm Shots button.

  2. Shop system

    • The Shop ▼ button (only in the move phase) drops a simple list with the six items requested.

    • Prices automatically drop by $10 when any of your ships sits on a shop tile.

    • Beacon and Harvester require drag‑and‑drop placement (blue preview, then Confirm).

  3. Persistent upgrades

    • Laser Spread (+1 laser radius per purchase) and Laser Shots (+1 shot) apply immediately and stack.

    • Plunderer’s Instinct and Gas Man add the specified bonuses whenever resources are gathered—ships and harvesters—starting the very next turn.

  4. Harvesters

    • Visible to both players at all times: blue = yours, red = opponent’s.

    • Provide ⅕ of the normal tile reward each turn.

  5. UI clean‑up

    • Intel circles no longer render “+F/+B” text.

    • The old Buy Beacon button is replaced by the shop.

Just replace the existing files with these, restart your Flask server, and reload the browser. Let me know if anything needs tweaking!

<script>
/******************** CONSTANTS & CANVAS ********************/
const SZ=10,N=101,BASE_LASER_R=5,BOMB_R=2,BOMB_RANGE=8;
const BG=document.getElementById('bg').getContext('2d');
const ctx=document.getElementById('draw').getContext('2d');
const socket=io();

/******************** STATE *******************************/
let role=null,phase={X:'base',O:'base'};
let ships=[],oldShips=[],radii=[0,0,0];
let gas=new Set(),starT=new Set(),gem=new Set(),sgem=new Set(),shop=new Set();
let beacons=[],harvesters=[];
let enemyOld=[],enemyRad=[],circleTog={};
let shots=[],currentWeapon='laser';
let baseCell=null,placingBase=false,gameEnded=false;

/* upgrades */
let upg={laser_spread:0,laser_shots:0};

/* placement helpers */
let pendingBeacon=null,pendingHarv=null,draggingBeacon=false;

/******************** UTILS *******************************/
const cellXY=id=>[id%N,Math.floor(id/N)];
const toId =(x,y)=>y*N+x;
function canvasCell(e){const r=ctx.canvas.getBoundingClientRect();const x=Math.floor((e.clientX-r.left)/SZ),y=Math.floor((e.clientY-r.top)/SZ);return (x>=0&&y>=0&&x<N&&y<N)?{x,y,id:toId(x,y)}:null;}
function clearDraw(){ctx.clearRect(0,0,1010,1010);}
function drawTri(x,y){const s=4*SZ,cx=x*SZ+SZ/2,cy=y*SZ;ctx.fillStyle='silver';ctx.beginPath();ctx.moveTo(cx,cy);ctx.lineTo(cx-s/2,cy+s);ctx.lineTo(cx+s/2,cy+s);ctx.closePath();ctx.fill();}
function drawSquare(x,y,color){ctx.fillStyle=color;ctx.fillRect(x*SZ+2,y*SZ+2,SZ-4,SZ-4);}
function drawResDot(x,y,color){ctx.fillStyle=color;ctx.beginPath();ctx.arc(x*SZ+SZ/2,y*SZ+SZ/2,SZ/3,0,2*Math.PI);ctx.fill();}
function distanceId(id,x,y){const[xx,yy]=cellXY(id);return Math.hypot(x-xx,y-yy);}

/******************** TERRAIN BACKGROUND *******************/
function paintTerrain(){
  BG.clearRect(0,0,1010,1010);
  const fill=(set,col)=>{BG.fillStyle=col;set.forEach(id=>{const[x,y]=cellXY(id);BG.fillRect(x*SZ,y*SZ,SZ,SZ);});};
  fill(gas,'rgba(0,120,255,.25)'); fill(starT,'rgba(0,200,255,.6)');
  fill(gem,'rgba(150,0,0,.25)');  fill(sgem,'rgba(255,0,0,.6)');
  BG.fillStyle='purple'; shop.forEach(id=>{const[x,y]=cellXY(id);BG.fillRect(x*SZ,y*SZ,SZ,SZ);});
}

/******************** BARS *******************************/
const barsDiv=document.getElementById('bars');
function refreshBars(){barsDiv.innerHTML='';radii.forEach(r=>{const w=document.createElement('div');w.className='barWrap';const b=document.createElement('div');b.className='bar';b.style.width=Math.min(r,20)*5+'%';w.appendChild(b);barsDiv.appendChild(w);});}

/******************** DRAW HELPERS ************************/
function drawBeaconArrow(x,y,dir,color){
  ctx.fillStyle=color;ctx.save();
  ctx.translate(x*SZ+SZ/2,y*SZ+SZ/2);
  ctx.rotate((dir*Math.PI/2)+3*Math.PI/4);
  ctx.beginPath();ctx.moveTo(0,-6);ctx.lineTo(3,6);ctx.lineTo(-3,6);ctx.closePath();ctx.fill();
  ctx.restore();
}

/******************** RENDER ********************************/
function render(){
  if(gameEnded)return;clearDraw();

  /* cost circles */
  ctx.strokeStyle='cyan';
  oldShips.forEach((o,i)=>{if(radii[i]>0){const[x,y]=cellXY(o);ctx.beginPath();ctx.arc(x*SZ+SZ/2,y*SZ+SZ/2,radii[i]*SZ,0,2*Math.PI);ctx.stroke();}});

  /* markers */
  ctx.strokeStyle='yellow';
  oldShips.forEach(id=>{if(!ships.includes(id)){const[x,y]=cellXY(id);ctx.strokeRect(x*SZ+1,y*SZ+1,SZ-2,SZ-2);}});
  ctx.strokeStyle='red';
  enemyOld.forEach(id=>{const[x,y]=cellXY(id);ctx.strokeRect(x*SZ+1,y*SZ+1,SZ-2,SZ-2);});

  /* intel rings only (no text) */
  Object.values(circleTog).forEach(o=>{
    if(o.v){const[x,y]=cellXY(o.id);ctx.strokeStyle='rgba(0,150,255,.4)';
      ctx.beginPath();ctx.arc(x*SZ+SZ/2,y*SZ+SZ/2,o.r*SZ,0,2*Math.PI);ctx.stroke();}
  });

  /* ships & resource dots */
  ships.forEach(id=>{
    const[x,y]=cellXY(id);drawTri(x,y);
    if(gas.has(id))      drawResDot(x,y,'blue');
    else if(starT.has(id))drawResDot(x,y,'cyan');
    else if(gem.has(id)) drawResDot(x,y,'red');
    else if(sgem.has(id))drawResDot(x,y,'crimson');
    else if(shop.has(id))drawResDot(x,y,'purple');
  });

  /* harvesters */
  harvesters.forEach(h=>{const[x,y]=cellXY(h.cell);drawSquare(x,y,h.owner===role?'#00f':'#f00');});

  /* shots */
  shots.forEach(s=>{
    const r=s.type==='bomb'?BOMB_R:BASE_LASER_R+upg.laser_spread;
    ctx.fillStyle=s.type==='bomb'?'rgba(255,0,0,.25)':'rgba(0,255,0,.25)';
    for(let dy=-r;dy<=r;dy++)for(let dx=-r;dx<=r;dx++){
      const x=s.x+dx,y=s.y+dy;
      if(x<0||y<0||x>=N||y>=N)continue;
      if(Math.hypot(dx,dy)<=r)ctx.fillRect(x*SZ,y*SZ,SZ,SZ);
    }
  });

  /* beacons */
  beacons.forEach(b=>{const[x,y]=cellXY(b.cell);drawBeaconArrow(x,y,b.dir,b.owner===role?'orange':'blue');});

  /* placement previews */
  if(pendingBeacon) drawBeaconArrow(pendingBeacon.x,pendingBeacon.y,pendingBeacon.dir,'white');
  if(pendingHarv)   drawSquare(pendingHarv.x,pendingHarv.y,'#0ff');
}

/******************** BASE PLACEMENT **********************/
const starDiv=document.getElementById('star');
function setStarPos(cell){starDiv.style.left=cell.x*SZ+'px';starDiv.style.top=cell.y*SZ+'px';}
ctx.canvas.addEventListener('mousedown',e=>{
  if(phase[role]!=='base')return;
  const c=canvasCell(e);if(!c)return;
  placingBase=true;baseCell=c;setStarPos(c);starDiv.style.display='block';
});
ctx.canvas.addEventListener('mousemove',e=>{
  if(!placingBase)return;
  const c=canvasCell(e);if(c){baseCell=c;setStarPos(c);}
});
window.addEventListener('mouseup',()=>placingBase=false);

/******************** WEAPON TOGGLE ***********************/
document.getElementById('weapon').onclick=()=>{
  currentWeapon=currentWeapon==='laser'?'bomb':'laser';
  document.getElementById('weapon').textContent='Weapon: '+(currentWeapon==='laser'?'Laser':'Bomb');
};

/******************** SHOP MENU ***************************/
const shopBtn=document.getElementById('shopBtn');
const shopMenu=document.getElementById('shopMenu');

shopBtn.onclick=e=>{
  e.stopPropagation();
  if(shopMenu.style.display==='block'){shopMenu.style.display='none';return;}
  /* position menu just under the button */
  const r=shopBtn.getBoundingClientRect();
  shopMenu.style.left=r.left+'px';
  shopMenu.style.top=(r.bottom+window.scrollY)+'px';
  shopMenu.style.display='block';
};
window.addEventListener('click',()=>shopMenu.style.display='none');

/* click handlers for each item */
shopMenu.querySelectorAll('button').forEach(btn=>{
  btn.onclick=()=>{
    socket.emit('shop_purchase',{item:btn.dataset.item});
    shopMenu.style.display='none';
  };
});

/******************** FIRING SHOTS ************************/
let shotDrag=null;
function shotRadius(){return BASE_LASER_R+upg.laser_spread;}

ctx.canvas.addEventListener('mousedown',e=>{
  if(phase[role]!=='fire'||e.button!==0)return;
  const c=canvasCell(e);if(!c)return;
  const rad=shotRadius();
  const idx=shots.findIndex(s=>Math.hypot(s.x-c.x,s.y-c.y)<= (s.type==='bomb'?BOMB_R:rad));
  const limit=3+upg.laser_shots;
  shotDrag=(idx>-1)?idx:(shots.length<limit?shots.push({x:c.x,y:c.y,id:c.id,type:currentWeapon})-1:null);
  if(shotDrag!==null)updateShot(c,true);
});
ctx.canvas.addEventListener('mousemove',e=>{
  if(shotDrag===null)return;
  const c=canvasCell(e);if(c)updateShot(c,false);
});
window.addEventListener('mouseup',()=>shotDrag=null);

function updateShot(c,forceType){
  if(forceType)shots[shotDrag].type=currentWeapon;
  if(shots[shotDrag].type==='bomb' && !ships.some(id=>distanceId(id,c.x,c.y)<=BOMB_RANGE))return;
  Object.assign(shots[shotDrag],{x:c.x,y:c.y,id:c.id});
  render();
  document.getElementById('confirm').disabled=(shots.length<3+upg.laser_shots);
}

/******************** ENEMY INTEL RIGHT‑CLICK *************/
ctx.canvas.addEventListener('contextmenu',e=>e.preventDefault());
ctx.canvas.addEventListener('mousedown',e=>{
  if(e.button!==2)return;
  const c=canvasCell(e);if(!c)return;
  if(pendingBeacon){pendingBeacon.dir=(pendingBeacon.dir+1)%4;render();return;}
  const idx=enemyOld.indexOf(c.id);
  if(idx>-1){
    const key=c.id;
    circleTog[key]=circleTog[key]?({...circleTog[key],v:!circleTog[key].v}):{id:key,r:enemyRad[idx],v:true};
    render();
  }
});

/******************** MOVE DRAGGING ************************/
let dragShip=null,dragRad=null;
function distOld(i){const[oX,oY]=cellXY(oldShips[i]);const[nX,nY]=cellXY(ships[i]);return Math.hypot(oX-nX,oY-nY);}
function sendMove(){socket.emit('move_packet',{ships:[...ships],radii:[...radii]});}

ctx.canvas.addEventListener('mousedown',e=>{
  if(phase[role]!=='move')return;
  const cell=canvasCell(e);if(!cell)return;

  /* placement drags */
  if(pendingBeacon && e.button===0){pendingBeacon={...pendingBeacon,x:cell.x,y:cell.y,id:cell.id};render();return;}
  if(pendingHarv   && e.button===0){pendingHarv  ={...pendingHarv ,x:cell.x,y:cell.y,id:cell.id};render();return;}

  if(e.button!==0)return;
  const idx=ships.indexOf(cell.id);
  if(idx>-1){dragShip=idx;return;}
  for(let i=0;i<3;i++){
    const[oX,oY]=cellXY(oldShips[i]);
    if(Math.abs(Math.hypot(cell.x-oX,cell.y-oY)-radii[i])<=.3){dragRad=i;return;}
  }
});
ctx.canvas.addEventListener('mousemove',e=>{
  const cell=canvasCell(e);if(!cell)return;
  if(dragShip!==null){
    ships[dragShip]=cell.id;
    radii[dragShip]=Math.max(radii[dragShip],distOld(dragShip));
    refreshBars();sendMove();render();
  }else if(dragRad!==null){
    const[oX,oY]=cellXY(oldShips[dragRad]);
    radii[dragRad]=Math.max(distOld(dragRad),Math.hypot(cell.x-oX,cell.y-oY));
    refreshBars();sendMove();render();
  }
});
window.addEventListener('mouseup',()=>{dragShip=dragRad=null;});

/******************** BUTTONS *****************************/
document.getElementById('confirm').onclick=()=>{
  socket.emit('fire_confirm',{shots:shots.map(s=>({cell:s.id,type:s.type}))});
};
document.getElementById('end').onclick=()=>{
  socket.emit('end_turn');document.getElementById('waiting').style.display='flex';
};
document.getElementById('reset').onclick=()=>socket.emit('reset_request');
document.getElementById('baseOk').onclick=()=>{if(baseCell)socket.emit('set_base',{cell:baseCell.id});};
document.getElementById('confirmBeacon').onclick=()=>{
  if(!pendingBeacon)return;
  socket.emit('confirm_beacon',{cell:pendingBeacon.id,dir:pendingBeacon.dir});
  pendingBeacon=null;this.style.display='none';render();
};
document.getElementById('confirmHarvester').onclick=()=>{
  if(!pendingHarv)return;
  socket.emit('confirm_harvester',{cell:pendingHarv.id});
  pendingHarv=null;this.style.display='none';render();
};

/******************** SOCKET EVENTS ***********************/
socket.on('role',d=>{
  role=d.role;ships=d.ships;upg={laser_spread:0,laser_shots:0};
  document.getElementById('credits').textContent='Fuel '+d.credits;
  document.getElementById('bucks').textContent='Bucks '+d.bucks;
  gas   =new Set(d.map.gas); starT=new Set(d.map.star);
  gem   =new Set(d.map.gem); sgem =new Set(d.map.sgem);
  shop  =new Set(d.map.shop);
  beacons=d.beacons;harvesters=d.harvesters;
  paintTerrain();
  if(d.needBase){phase[role]='base';starDiv.style.display='block';document.getElementById('baseOk').style.display='inline';}
  render();
});

socket.on('base_confirmed',()=>{
  document.getElementById('baseOk').style.display='none';
  starDiv.style.pointerEvents='none';
  phase[role]='fire';
  updateUI();
});

socket.on('state',s=>{
  phase=s.phase;
  document.getElementById('credits').textContent='Fuel '+s.credits[role];
  document.getElementById('bucks').textContent ='Bucks '+s.bucks[role];
  if(phase[role]==='fire'){shots.length=0;document.getElementById('waiting').style.display='none';}
  updateUI();
});

socket.on('start_move',d=>{oldShips=d.old;radii=[0,0,0];refreshBars();updateUI();render();});
socket.on('enemy_markers',d=>{enemyOld=d.old;enemyRad=d.rad;circleTog={};d.old.forEach((id,i)=>circleTog[id]={id,r:d.rad[i],v:true});render();});
socket.on('result',d=>{const[x,y]=cellXY(d.cell);ctx.fillStyle=d.hit?'orange':'#555';ctx.fillRect(x*SZ+2,y*SZ+2,SZ-4,SZ-4);});
socket.on('opponent_guess',d=>{const[x,y]=cellXY(d.cell);ctx.fillStyle='rgba(0,180,255,.4)';ctx.fillRect(x*SZ+1,y*SZ+1,SZ-2,SZ-2);});
socket.on('reset',()=>location.reload());
socket.on('game_over',d=>{gameEnded=true;document.getElementById('overlay').textContent=d.result==='victory'?'VICTORY!':'DEFEAT';document.getElementById('overlay').style.display='flex';});

socket.on('beacon_ready',()=>{pendingBeacon={x:50,y:50,id:toId(50,50),dir:0};document.getElementById('confirmBeacon').style.display='inline';updateUI();render();});
socket.on('harvester_ready',()=>{pendingHarv={x:50,y:50,id:toId(50,50)};document.getElementById('confirmHarvester').style.display='inline';updateUI();render();});
socket.on('new_beacon',d=>{beacons.push(d);render();});
socket.on('new_harvester',d=>{harvesters.push(d);render();});
socket.on('enemy_gains',d=>{
  const e=document.getElementById('enemyInfo');
  e.textContent=`Enemy Collection: ${d.bucks} Bucks, ${d.fuel} Fuel`;
});

/******************** UI HELPER ***************************/
function updateUI(){
  const weapon=document.getElementById('weapon'),
        confirm=document.getElementById('confirm'),
        endBtn=document.getElementById('end'),
        shopButton=shopBtn,
        confB=document.getElementById('confirmBeacon'),
        confH=document.getElementById('confirmHarvester'),
        moveInfo=document.getElementById('moveInfo'),
        enemyInfo=document.getElementById('enemyInfo');

  weapon.style.display=(phase[role]==='fire')?'inline':'none';
  enemyInfo.style.display=(phase[role]==='fire')?'inline':'none';
  confB.style.display=pendingBeacon?'inline':'none';
  confH.style.display=pendingHarv?'inline':'none';

  if(phase[role]==='fire'){
    confirm.style.display='inline';
    confirm.disabled=(shots.length<3+upg.laser_shots);
    endBtn.style.display='none';
    shopButton.style.display='none';
    moveInfo.style.display='none';
  }else if(phase[role]==='move'){
    confirm.style.display='none';
    endBtn.style.display='inline';
    shopButton.style.display='inline';
    moveInfo.style.display='inline';
    /* dynamic price update */
    const disc=ships.some(s=>shop.has(s))?10:0;
    document.querySelectorAll('#shopMenu button').forEach(b=>{
      const base=parseInt(b.dataset.item==='beacon'?25:
                          b.dataset.item==='laser_spread'?30:
                          b.dataset.item==='laser_shots'?35:
                          b.dataset.item==='harvester'?25:
                          b.dataset.item==='plunder'?30:30,10);
      b.textContent=b.textContent.split('$')[0]+'$'+(base-disc);
    });
  }else{
    confirm.style.display='none';endBtn.style.display='none';
    shopButton.style.display='none';moveInfo.style.display='none';
    enemyInfo.style.display='none';
  }
  render();   /* keep visuals fresh */
}

Below are drop‑in replacements for app.py and index.html.
They touch only what’s needed for your new “enemy collection” display:

  • Backend now sends each player a single enemy_totals packet when a turn resolves.

app.py

python
import eventlet, math, random
from flask import Flask, render_template, request
from flask_socketio import SocketIO, emit

eventlet.monkey_patch()

# ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# (constants & map generation are unchanged)
# ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
BOARD        = 101
LASER_RADIUS = 5
BOMB_RADIUS  = 2
BOMB_RANGE   = 8
SHOT_LIMIT   = 3
HIT_CREDIT   = 100

GAS_CR, STAR_CR = 50, 100
GEM_BU, SGEM_BU = 10, 20
BEACON_COST, BEACON_SALE = 25, 15

DIR_VECT = [(1,1),(1,-1),(-1,-1),(-1,1)]
# ...  (terrain generation code unchanged)  ...

# ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# GAME DATA
# ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
def start_pos():
    c = BOARD//2
    return [c*BOARD+c, c*BOARD+(c-1), (c-1)*BOARD+c]

game = {p:{'sid':None,'ships':start_pos(),'old':[],'credits':0,
           'bucks':0,'base':None} for p in ('X','O')}
player_phase = {'X':'base','O':'base'}
moves_pending = {'X':None,'O':None}
players, beacons = {}, []
game_over = False

# ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# HELPERS
# ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
def dist_cells(a,b):
    ar,ac = divmod(a,BOARD); br,bc = divmod(b,BOARD)
    return math.hypot(ar-br, ac-bc)

def pub_state():
    return {'phase':player_phase,
            'credits':{p:game[p]['credits'] for p in ('X','O')},
            'bucks'  :{p:game[p]['bucks']   for p in ('X','O')}}

def send_state():
    socketio.emit('state', pub_state())

# ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# FLASK / SOCKET.IO  (only resolve_if_both_done changed)
# ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
app = Flask(__name__)
socketio = SocketIO(app)

@app.route('/')
def index(): return render_template('index.html')

# (all handlers above resolve_if_both_done are unchanged) …

# ── END TURN ─────────────────────────────────────────────
@socketio.on('end_turn')
def end_turn():
    role = players.get(request.sid)
    if role is None or player_phase[role] != 'move': return
    if moves_pending[role] is None:
        moves_pending[role]={'ships':game[role]['old'][:],'radii':[0,0,0]}
    player_phase[role]='done'
    emit('waiting')
    resolve_if_both_done()

def resolve_if_both_done():
    if player_phase['X']!='done' or player_phase['O']!='done':
        send_state(); return

    gains = {'X':{'fuel':0,'bucks':0}, 'O':{'fuel':0,'bucks':0}}

    # apply moves, figure totals
    for role in ('X','O'):
        mp     = moves_pending[role]
        ships  = mp['ships']; radii = mp['radii']
        fixed  = [max(r, dist_cells(o,n)) for o,n,r in zip(game[role]['old'],ships,radii)]

        fuel = sum(STAR_CR if s in star else GAS_CR if s in gas else 0 for s in ships)
        bucks= sum(SGEM_BU if s in sgem else GEM_BU if s in gem else 0 for s in ships)
        gains[role]['fuel']=fuel
        gains[role]['bucks']=bucks

        game[role]['ships']   = ships
        game[role]['credits'] += fuel - math.ceil(sum(fixed))
        game[role]['bucks']  += bucks

    # send enemy intel markers *and* new enemy_totals packet
    for viewer, enemy in (('X','O'),('O','X')):
        sid = game[viewer]['sid']
        if not sid: continue
        ep = moves_pending[enemy]
        emit('enemy_markers',{
            'old': game[enemy]['old'],
            'rad': ep['radii'],
            'cr' : [STAR_CR if s in star else GAS_CR if s in gas else 0 for s in ep['ships']],
            'bk' : [SGEM_BU if s in sgem else GEM_BU if s in gem else 0 for s in ep['ships']]
        }, room=sid)
        emit('enemy_totals', gains[enemy], room=sid)

    # prepare next turn
    moves_pending['X']=moves_pending['O']=None
    player_phase['X']=player_phase['O']='fire'
    send_state()

# (reset & victory handlers unchanged)
if __name__ == '__main__':
    socketio.run(app,host='0.0.0.0',port=5000,debug=True)

1‑E  ▼ NEW socket event: shop_purchase

Add just above the existing buy_beacon handler (we’ll keep that one for legacy calls):

python
@socketio.on('shop_purchase')
def shop_purchase(data):
    """data = {'item': <key from PRICES>}"""
    role = players.get(request.sid)
    if role is None or player_phase[role] != 'move': return
    item = data.get('item')
    if item not in PRICES: return

    cost = PRICES[item] - shop_discount(role)
    if game[role]['bucks'] < cost: return
    game[role]['bucks'] -= cost

    if item == 'beacon':
        emit('beacon_ready', room=request.sid)
    elif item == 'harvester':
        emit('harvester_ready', room=request.sid)          # client will drag & confirm
    else:                             # persistent upgrades stack
        game[role]['upg'][item] += 1
        send_state()                  # reflect new bucks total

1‑F  ▼ place harvester

@socketio.on('confirm_harvester')
def confirm_harvester(data):
    role = players.get(request.sid)
    if role is None or player_phase[role] != 'move': return
    cell = data.get('cell')
    if not isinstance(cell, int) or not 0 <= cell < BOARD*BOARD: return
    harvester = {'owner': role, 'cell': cell}
    harvesters.append(harvester)
    socketio.emit('new_harvester', harvester)

(1-H)
ChatGPT said:

Here is the exact replacement for the resolve_if_both_done() function, implementing the harvesting logic and upgrades (plunder, gasman):

python
def resolve_if_both_done():
    if player_phase['X'] != 'done' or player_phase['O'] != 'done':
        send_state()
        return

    gains = {'X': {'fuel': 0, 'bucks': 0}, 'O': {'fuel': 0, 'bucks': 0}}

    # Apply moves and calculate gains
    for role in ('X', 'O'):
        mp = moves_pending[role]
        ships = mp['ships']
        radii = mp['radii']
        upg = game[role]['upg']
        fixed = [max(r, dist_cells(o, n)) for o, n, r in zip(game[role]['old'], ships, radii)]

        # Ship-based resource collection
        for s in ships:
            if s in star:
                gains[role]['fuel'] += STAR_CR + upg['gasman'] * 50
            elif s in gas:
                gains[role]['fuel'] += GAS_CR + upg['gasman'] * 25

            if s in sgem:
                gains[role]['bucks'] += SGEM_BU + upg['plunder'] * 10
            elif s in gem:
                gains[role]['bucks'] += GEM_BU + upg['plunder'] * 5

        # Harvester-based resource collection (1/5th value)
        for h in harvesters:
            if h['owner'] != role:
                continue
            cell = h['cell']
            if cell in star:
                gains[role]['fuel'] += (STAR_CR + upg['gasman'] * 50) // 5
            elif cell in gas:
                gains[role]['fuel'] += (GAS_CR + upg['gasman'] * 25) // 5
            elif cell in sgem:
                gains[role]['bucks'] += (SGEM_BU + upg['plunder'] * 10) // 5
            elif cell in gem:
                gains[role]['bucks'] += (GEM_BU + upg['plunder'] * 5) // 5

        # Apply movement costs and update resources
        game[role]['ships'] = ships
        game[role]['credits'] += gains[role]['fuel'] - math.ceil(sum(fixed))
        game[role]['bucks'] += gains[role]['bucks']

    # Send enemy intel markers and enemy totals packet
    for viewer, enemy in (('X', 'O'), ('O', 'X')):
        sid = game[viewer]['sid']
        if not sid:
            continue
        ep = moves_pending[enemy]
        emit('enemy_markers', {
            'old': game[enemy]['old'],
            'rad': ep['radii'],
            'cr': [STAR_CR if s in star else GAS_CR if s in gas else 0 for s in ep['ships']],
            'bk': [SGEM_BU if s in sgem else GEM_BU if s in gem else 0 for s in ep['ships']]
        }, room=sid)
        emit('enemy_totals', gains[enemy], room=sid)

    # Prepare for the next turn
    moves_pending['X'] = moves_pending['O'] = None
    player_phase['X'] = player_phase['O'] = 'fire'
    send_state()

✅ Summary of Changes:

  • Harvesters: Added processing for harvesters, with 1/5th resource yield.

  • Gasman / Plunderer Instinct: Applied in both ship-based and harvester-based resource collection.

  • Resource Collection: Ships and harvesters both contribute to the fuel and bucks totals.

Everything else — movement, shot handling, etc. — remains unchanged.
Copy‑paste, save, and restart the server to apply the changes.

Here is the exact replacement for the updateUI() function, implementing the shop menu pricing updates (2-F):

javascript
function updateUI() {
  const w = document.getElementById('weapon'),
        c = document.getElementById('confirm'),
        e = document.getElementById('end'),
        sb = document.getElementById('shopBtn'),
        cb = document.getElementById('confirmBeacon'),
        ch = document.getElementById('confirmHarv'),
        m  = document.getElementById('moveInfo'),
        ei = document.getElementById('enemyInfo');

  w.style.display = (phase[role] === 'fire') ? 'inline' : 'none';
  ei.style.display = (phase[role] === 'fire') ? 'inline' : 'none';
  cb.style.display = pendingBeacon ? 'inline' : 'none';
  ch.style.display = pendingHarv ? 'inline' : 'none';

  if (phase[role] === 'fire') {
    c.style.display = 'inline';
    e.style.display = 'none';
    sb.style.display = 'none';
    m.style.display = 'none';
    c.disabled = (shots.length < 3);
  } 
  else if (phase[role] === 'move') {
    c.style.display = 'none';
    e.style.display = 'inline';
    m.style.display = 'inline';
    sb.style.display = 'inline';

    const disc = ships.some(s => shop.has(s)) ? 10 : 0;

    // Update shop menu prices
    shopMenu.querySelectorAll('button').forEach(b => {
      const key = b.dataset.item;
      const base = {
        'beacon': 25,
        'laser_spread': 30,
        'laser_shots': 35,
        'harvester': 25,
        'plunder': 30,
        'gasman': 30
      }[key];
      b.textContent = b.textContent.split('$')[0] + `$${base - disc}`;
    });

    ei.style.display = 'none'; // Hide during move phase
  } 
  else {
    c.style.display = e.style.display = sb.style.display = m.style.display = 'none';
    ei.style.display = 'none';
  }
}

✅ Summary of Changes:

  • Removed the b reference: The buyBeacon button is no longer needed, as the shop menu handles beacon purchases.

  • Shop Price Updates: Dynamically updates all shop menu items based on the $10 discount if any ship is on a shop tile.

  • Confirm Harvester Display Logic: Added ch.style.display line to handle the harvester confirmation button visibility.

  • Consistent Formatting: Ensured that all buttons and states are managed in the same section for clarity.

Copy‑paste this version to replace the entire function, save, and refresh. Let me know if it works as expected.
